CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 25, 1954, pg. 1, reads: "A Patty Jo Doll For Lucky Girl - A 12-year-old girl from Charleroi wrote to the Courier asking for a doll. She begged us not to put her name in paper as it might "make mamma feel bad."  But Santa knew the heart of the little girl so he is going to send her a genuine Patty Jo Colored Doll.  Pictured are Jean Farrish, who accepted the doll for the committee, and Rose Canford, who dressed Patty Jo. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Jean Farrish and Rose Canford holding Patty Jo doll, in Pittsburgh Courier offices with Christmas decorations
